summary: This bill, the Expanding Defense Community Partnerships Act, amends Title 10 of the United States Code to expand the Department of Defense's authority regarding intergovernmental support agreements. It allows the Secretary of Defense to partner with other federal agencies, broadens the funding sources for these agreements, extends the sunset date for certain provisions, and includes facility-related services in the scope of support. The bill also establishes a pilot program for intergovernmental support agreements within the Army, Navy, and Air Force.
